width

Text font

The font utility changes the weight and size of an element’s text font. Bold fonts are darker and heavier whereas light fonts are thinner. Font size’s are changed relative to the current font size.

Arguments

tag

A tag element.

size

One of "2x", "3x", …, or "10x" specifying a factor to increase a tag element’s font size by (e.g. "2x" is double the base font size), defaults to NULL, in which case the font size is unchanged.

weight

One of "bold", "normal", "light", "italic", or "monospace" specifying the font weight of the element’s text, defaults to NULL, in which case the font is unchanged.

Source
